scripts.clean: rm -rf build && rm -rf build-firefox && rm -rf build-chrome
scripts.pack: npm run clean && parcel build src/manifest.json --target webext-dev
scripts.pack:chromium: mv src/manifest.json src/manifest.json.bak && jq -r 'del( .browser_specific_settings )' src/manifest.json.bak > src/manifest.json && npm run clean && parcel build src/manifest.json --target webext-prod-chrome && rm src/manifest.json && mv src/manifest.json.bak src/manifest.json
scripts.pack:ff: npm run clean && parcel build src/manifest.json --target webext-prod-firefox
scripts.build:chromium: npm run pack:chromium && chromium --pack-extension=build --pack-extension-key=$PATH_TO_CHROME_KEY && mkdir -p dist && mv build.crx dist/IMAGE-chrome.crx
